edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol.cramerShoupEncryptedValue

Class SigmaCramerShoupEncryptedValueSimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol.cramerShoupEncryptedValue.SigmaCramerShoupEncryptedValueSimulator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SigmaSimulator

    public class SigmaCramerShoupEncryptedValueSimulator
extends java.lang.Object
implements SigmaSimulator
    Concrete implementation of Sigma Simulator.

    This implementation simulates the case that the prover convince a verifier that the value encrypted under Cramer-Shoup in the ciphertext (u1,u2,e,v) with public-key g1,g2,c,d,h is x.

    The protocol is for the case that the prover knows the randomness used to encrypt.

    The pseudo code of this protocol can be found in Protocol 1.10 of pseudo codes document at http://cryptobiu.github.io/scapi/SDK_Pseudocode.pdf.

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)
